LearningAchievement.name: LearningAchievement
LearningAchievement.description: Represents information about the outcome of a learning activity.

Abbreviation.description: Short name for a Learning Achievement.

AcademicLevel.description: The applicable point in the education process.

FieldOfStudy.description: The academic subject related to the course of study.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

IssuerId.description: The institution that grants the credential.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Name of a Learning Achievement that represents a modeled qualification, achievement, or other program outcome. Used to provide a meaningful mapping between Learnings and the result of their successful completion.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

Specialization.description: Narrows the category, subject, area of study, discipline, or general branch of knowledge that the achievement was awarded for.
